mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_mt_template_images ( cart_id, channel_id, key_extend1, key_extend2, model_type, image_model_url, syn_flg, created, creater, modified, modifier ) VALUES( #{cartId}, #{channelId}, #{keyExtend1}, #{keyExtend2}, #{modelType}, #{imageModelUrl}, #{synFlg}, #{created}, #{creater}, #{modified}, #{modifier} )
